ValidationRule.description:
Can't move an opportunity beyond closing if the primary quote needs to be calculated.
Added validation bypass - Tommy 1/18/21
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( $Permission.Validation_Rule_Exemption ), TEXT(Type) = 'Revenue Opportunity', Probability > 0.95, NOT(ISBLANK( SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__c )), SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Uncalculated__c = TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The primary quote must be recalculated in order to move this opportunity beyond 'Closing'
